ca.mcgill.hs.network
Class LogServerClient

java.lang.Object
  ca.mcgill.hs.network.LogServerClient

public class LogServerClient
extends java.lang.Object

Used for demos, this allows the app to connect to a logging server running on another computer, and send data for visualisation. We create two data streams, one for sending the class labels from the classifier, and one for sending the raw sensor data.

Constructor Summary
LogServerClient()
          Creates a client and sets up the socket connection to localhost, port 12021.
LogServerClient(java.lang.String host, int port)
          Alternatively we can specify the host and port.

Constructor Detail

LogServerClient

public LogServerClient()
Creates a client and sets up the socket connection to localhost, port 12021. We connect to localhost because we tend to use ssh tunneling to forward the local port to the server.

LogServerClient

public LogServerClient(java.lang.String host,
                       int port)
Alternatively we can specify the host and port.

Parameters:
host - Hostname to connect to.
port - Port to connect to.
Method Detail

cdata

public java.io.DataOutputStream cdata(java.util.List<java.lang.String> classNames)
Returns the stream for sending the raw sensor data.

Parameters:
classNames - The list of class labels.
Returns:
The stream to which raw sensor data should be written.

classify

public java.io.DataOutputStream classify(java.util.List<java.lang.String> classNames)
Returns the stream for sending the class scores.

Parameters:
classNames - The list of class labels.
Returns:
The stream to which class scores should be written.

connect

public void connect()
Initializes the connection to the server. Must be called before retrieving the output streams.

disconnect

public void disconnect()
                throws java.io.IOException
Closes the connections. Any attempts to write to the output streams after calling this method will cause an exception to be thrown.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - Thrown if any of the streams cannot be closed.

isConnected

public boolean isConnected()
Returns:
True if the connection to the server is active, or false otherwise.
